achievements.title: First Place
achievements.desc: Presented a live demonstration of a CNN that could break some simple captcha.

achievements.title: Runner Up
achievements.desc: Trained an object detection algorithm that could detect a few hand signs.

achievements.title: Runner Up
achievements.desc: A 10 day contest involving a highly skewed dataset to detect debit card fraud.

achievements.title: Peoples Choice Award
achievements.desc: Presented a simple carry-on device created using a Raspberry Pi and an accelerometer sensor that can detect if a person has been assualted and if so sends SMS alerts.

achievements.title: Winner
achievements.desc: Demonstrated a proof of concept of an Android app that could be potentially used to non-intrusively detect potholes using an LSTM that analyzes sensor readings from the mobile phone.
